title: Pharaoh Rejects Moses
summary: Exodus 5 shows Moses and Aaron confronting Pharaoh to let Israel go. Pharaoh refuses and increases the Israelitesâ€™ workload, causing the people to blame Moses and lose hope.

faq.question: How did Pharaoh respond to Moses' request?
faq.answer: He rejected it and accused the Israelites of being lazy, then made their labor harder.

faq.question: How did the Israelites react to the increased burdens?
faq.answer: They were angry and discouraged, blaming Moses for making their situation worse.
